item.title: Blog: On generating value from data
item.description: Today, many leaders inherently understand that there is value in their organisational data. The challenge, however, lies in the ability of the organisation to realise that perceived value: ideas are cheap and execution is everything. Ideation In ideation the following are important: Any data is only valuable if it can be used to inform a decision making process. This tenent connects the collection of data in a raw format to the generation of information which is valuable to a user, customer or organisation; informed decisions are more valuable than uninformed decisions.
